code: import create from"zustand";export var useButton=create(function(set){return{buttonClick:"",setButton:function setButton(newName){return set(function(state){return{buttonClick:newName};});}};});export var getTotal=create(function(set){return{total:0,setTotal:function setTotal(amount){return set(function(state){return{total:amount};});}};});
